ids_info.name: dataset_description
ids_info.description: General description of the dataset (collection of all IDSs within the given database entry). Main description text to be put in ids_properties/comment

dataset_description/pulse_time_begin.documentation:
=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: dataset_description/pulse_time_begin
IDS: dataset_description
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 1
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 2
PARENT_CONTAINER: dataset_description
FIELD_NAME: pulse_time_begin
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: dataset_description -> pulse_time_begin

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Date and time (UTC) at which the pulse started on the experiment (if relevant), expressed in a human readable form (ISO 8601) : the format of the string shall be : YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ. Example : 2020-07-24T14:19:00Z

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[dataset_description]: General description of the dataset (collection of all IDSs within the given database entry). Main description text to be put in ids_properties/comment

dataset_description/pulse_time_begin_epo.documentation:
=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: dataset_description/pulse_time_begin_epoch
IDS: dataset_description
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 1
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 2
PARENT_CONTAINER: dataset_description
FIELD_NAME: pulse_time_begin_epoch
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: dataset_description -> pulse_time_begin_epoch

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Time at which the pulse started on the experiment (if relevant), expressed in Unix Epoch time. Temporarily represented as two integers, since for the moment IMAS is missing 64bits long integers to represent epoch time with nanoseconds resolution

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[dataset_description]: General description of the dataset (collection of all IDSs within the given database entry). Main description text to be put in ids_properties/comment

IDS: dataset_description
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 2
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 3
PARENT_CONTAINER: dataset_description/pulse_time_begin_epoch
FIELD_NAME: seconds
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: dataset_description -> pulse_time_begin_epoch -> seconds

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Elapsed seconds since the Unix Epoch time (01/01/1970 00:00:00 UTC)

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[dataset_description]: General description of the dataset (collection of all IDSs within the given database entry). Main description text to be put in ids_properties/comment
CONTAINER[dataset_description/pulse_time_begin_epoch]: Time at which the pulse started on the experiment (if relevant), expressed in Unix Epoch time. Temporarily represented as two integers, since for the moment IMAS is missing 64bits long integers to represent epoch time with nanoseconds resolution

=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: dataset_description/pulse_time_begin_epoch/nanoseconds
IDS: dataset_description
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 2
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 3
PARENT_CONTAINER: dataset_description/pulse_time_begin_epoch
FIELD_NAME: nanoseconds
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: dataset_description -> pulse_time_begin_epoch -> nanoseconds

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Elapsed nanoseconds since the time in seconds indicated above

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[dataset_description]: General description of the dataset (collection of all IDSs within the given database entry). Main description text to be put in ids_properties/comment
CONTAINER[dataset_description/pulse_time_begin_epoch]: Time at which the pulse started on the experiment (if relevant), expressed in Unix Epoch time. Temporarily represented as two integers, since for the moment IMAS is missing 64bits long integers to represent epoch time with nanoseconds resolution

IDS: dataset_description

TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 2

FIELD_NAME: simulation
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
